title: Odile Renaud-Basso - Wikipedia
snippet: Odile Renaud-Basso (born 2 June 1965) is a French civil servant who has been serving as president of the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development since 2020. From 2016 to 2020, she served as head of the Direction générale du Trésor. From 2018 to 2020, she served as vice president ...

snippet: Ms Renaud-Basso is a graduate of the Paris Institut d’Etudes Politiques (Sciences Po) and an Ecole Nationale d’Administration alum. She also attended Harvard University’s John F.
